summary: This module provides the logic to translate rerank results from Cohere's API schema to the schema expected by Together AI. It defines a configuration class that stores model settings and offers methods to parse the raw Together AI response into the standardized rerank response objects used by the library.
business_intent: Facilitate seamless integration of Together AI's reranking service by handling response format conversion, enabling accurate billing, token accounting, and consistent downstream processing within the platform.
